name: Barbara Ann Jacques, Ph.D.
what_you_do: Disrupting Gracefully is about breaking free from outdated systems, beliefs, and behaviors not by fighting them, but by creating something better. It is a movement toward aligned, sustainable growth rooted in expanded awareness, conscious leadership, and human connection.
who_you_serve: Disrupting Gracefully helps high-capacity individuals reconnect with their deeper truth so they can build lives and systems that actually fit.
social_proof: Barbara Ann Jacques, PhD, is the founder of Disrupting Gracefully, a platform dedicated to helping individuals and organizations break free from outdated systems and limiting beliefs to create new, sustainable models for growth. A criminal justice professor, TEDx speaker, and BLu Talk at MIT presenter, she bridges behavioral science, leadership, and human consciousness.
business_focus: Disrupting Gracefully focuses on building innovative models both personally and professionally that naturally render old patterns irrelevant.
